channel.title: Maximum Acheivement on Personal Knowledge Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Maximum Acheivement on Personal Knowledge Wiki

item.title: Chapter 1 : Make Your Life a Masterpiece
item.description: This is the age of achievement. Never have more people accomplished more things in more different fields than they are accomplishing today. More people are becoming successful at a faster rate than at any other time in history. There have never been more opportunities for you to turn your dreams into realities than there are right now. Leading futurists and prominent businesspeople are predicting that mankind is entering a Golden Age.

item.title: The Seven Laws of Mental Mastery
item.description: TODO Mental laws, although their physical effects cannot be seen quite so easily, also work 100 percent of the time. Whenever your life is going well, it means that your thoughts and activities are aligned and in harmony with these invisible mental laws. Whenever you are having problems of any kind, it is almost invariably because you are violating one or more of these laws, whether you know about them or not.
